In England, in the seven days to 28 July, there were 166,953 new confirmed cases (296.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 July, there were 281,640 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 41% (114,687 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 02 August is 5,154,292 (9,157.2 cases per 100,000 population).
